name: Mother 1+2
description: MOTHER, which many people declare to be the pinnacle of the RPG genre, is back on the GBA as a set of two games! MOTHER was a hot topic not only for copywriters but also for Mr. Shigesato Itoi, who has made a name for himself with his multi-faceted activities. Many fans have been waiting for the day when the series will be released. MOTHER 1 + 2 is a very beneficial game where you can enjoy MOTHER and MOTHER 2: Gyiyg's Counterattack on a single cartridge!
